channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: NECTAR TRI-PILLOW -Cooler, Comfy, Better Sleep! Buy One Get One FREE!
channel.desc: Discover the Nectar Tri-Comfort Cooling Pillow for the ultimate sleep experience! Adjustable to three firmness levels to provide customized support and cooling all night long. Order NOW to get a second pillow FREE, plus a 30-night home trial!
